title: Label Management and Annotation
description: Learn Label Management and Annotation in one minute.

hook.text: Your model is only as good as its labels. One annotator calls it 'cat,' another says 'kitten.'

buildup.text: Label management covers annotation workflows, quality assurance, and inter-annotator agreement.

discovery.text: Cohen's kappa measures how much annotators agree beyond chanceâ€”aim for > 0.8.

twist.text: Active learning prioritizes labeling the most informative examples, saving annotation budget.

climax.text: Tools: Label Studio, Labelbox, Prodigy. All support custom workflows and QA.

punchline.text: Good labels are expensive. Bad labels are more expensive.
